runs.comm: starts with a good, swinging delivery just outside the off stump
another good one swinging into the left-hander who, as ever, swings to leg
again smudged to leg - cheers by the crowd for another dot ball
he plays and misses do the fourth dot ball of the over. Good take by Foster standing up to the stumps
driven to mid-off
flicked to leg to ruin the maiden
down the leg side and nudged to fine leg
wide of the off stump and left alone
sweetly struck on the up but Collingwood's alert at cover
worked off his pads
and again he works it to leg
spanking extra-cover drive but again a fine stop in the covers
good, full delivery on leg stump and again Smith tries to work it to midwicket but can't break the infield
tries to go on the off side this time - Smith steps outside leg, tries to loft it but finds cover
lovely late cut brings Smith four! It was just short enough to run it out of Foster's hands
bashed out to cover
that's broken the heavily-packed off-side field! Steps to leg and gives himself room, forcing it past point for four. Top shot
nudged back to the bowler
four more. Outside off and uppercut wide of third man whose dive parries the ball into the rope
dabbed to third man
short, Smith gets a top edge as he pulls it and Foster runs 10 or 12 strides to his right, diving to take a fine chance
shorter and cut to Rashid at third man
guided to the recently-instated backward point, Swann, whose roll-and-tumble saves a run. Very good
left alone outside off
ooh a good slower ball by Anderson beats Kallis's wafty drive
fantastic delivery, edging straight to the vacant first slip
straighter, Kallis clips behind square leg
forced out to the off side but mistimed. Good-length delivery
a neat defensive dab but Foster saves it nicely to his right
short and dispatched through midwicket with a pull. Pietersen gives chase with general stiffness, and the pair of them save four
beaten by a beauty! A fine outswinger which beats Gibbs' loose stroke outside off
another swing and a miss as Gibbs charges down the pitch. Foster flings the ball at the stumps, threateningly
a short, fast delivery angling into Gibbs who tries to hook and again misses
pulled to square leg
neat late cut - played with high, soft hands
fuller this time and nudged to leg
starts with a nicely flighted delivery outside off, stroked to mid-off
crashed to long-off
fuller this time and Gibbs squirts it out to point
a timid clip off his toes
well flighted and he flicks it uppishly to the leg-side - not in control of that shot at all
an attempted sweep but only three runs from that over. England just about holding their own here
he too starts with a dot ball, tossing it up and Kallis bunts to mid-off
classical legspinner guided out to the off side
nice ball on middle-and-leg, nudged to leg
encouraging turn again for Rashid as Kallis goes for a sweep and is hit in the stomach
poor delivery, tossed up wide of the off stump and crashed out to deep extra cover
carved for another single to the same deep extra cover fielder
swept through midwicket
lovely flight by Swann, beating Kallis's sweep, and the ball balloons out to the off side but they nevertheless steal a single
nudged to deep mid-on
back-cut to third man
wide down the leg side
swept powerfully to fine leg
a full toss, boshed to long-on. No power or great intent in the stroke
pushed into the deep - a direct hit by the fielder but he's easily home
dabbed out to the off side and again they steal an easy single
ooh beaten by a flighty delivery, loose shot to mid-on
comes forward, pushing this tamely out to the off side
Gibbs attempts a strong pull but can't really time it
carved out to deep point
big shout for lbw, but it struck him outside the line. Ball balloons to backward point but Collingwood's throw is terrible and Foster takes it miles above his head
forced off the back foot out to cover
nudged out to long-on
opens the face and guides it almost down third man's throat, but it doesn't carry
forced off the back foot past point, down to third man and they get two
stroked out to long-off
huge shot! A slow long-hop which sat out and begged to be flogged. Kallis thusly flogged
tossed up - good response
tossed it up wide of the off stump and induces a play-and-miss. Big turn
another flogging pull - well fielded by Wright on the boundary
beautiful delivery! Drift there into the right hander before spinning away. Rashid's best delivery by a long shot - a corking jaffa
leg-side this time and swept hard to steal the strike
good, straight ball cutting back into Kallis who smacks it back to the the bowler
swinging into the right hander, flicked to long-on
solid thump over midwicket! Absolutely hammers it for four to bring up their 54-ball fifty partnership
nice thinking by Mascarenhas, pitching it fuller
forced to cover
expansively driven but only for a single
Kallis murders this - absolutely hammers it of the back and Collingwood somehow stops it at short extra cover with one hand
short of a length and it hurries onto Kallis, the ball hitting high on his bat - a mistimed pull. Difficult to time the ball on this pitch, at this stage of the evening
Gibbs tries to flip it to fine leg but gets a leading/top edge over the wicketkeeper for four
well wide of the off stump
pulled to midwicket, just for a single this time
short and hammered over midwicket. South Africa on the charge now
attempts to crash it through the covers but it's a little too full
bosh! Take that. Skips down the pitch and dispatches Swann over his head for six
ping! Gibbs gave that everything but was beaten by the flight
flings down a dart, Gibbs steps to leg and carves out to the off side
elegantly stroked, opening the face out to the off side
goddim! Well bowled, Swann. Tossed it up and Gibbs tried to pull, but the turn sneaked under his bat to shatter his stumps
flicked over midwicket
opened the face down to third man

Broad tries something different, stretching out his left arm just before he reached his delivery stride, but de Villiers works it out behind square. Bopara's throw hits the stumps, but, frankly, vast amounts of whatever
a slower bouncer which hits de Villiers in the chest
chopped down. Foster fields
another full toss which he forces to leg
another full toss and Kallis smacks it behind square for four, bringing up his fifty from 46 balls
outside off, stroked to mid-off
skips down the pitch and cracks this miles in the air! That's hit jupiter! Bopara doesn't pick it up initially then drops it going for a glory-slide. Pretty shoddy effort to be frank
pushed to leg
cuts and misses
worked to long-on
beautiful little late-cut-cum-dab by de Villiers
very well bowled, flighting this on middle and it squares him up
short, wide, cut
lovely ball, lovely catch - well bowled Rashid! Classic legspinner's delivery which bounced and turned on de Villiers, edging it to Collingwood's right at first slip. Fine catch
nice flight, good pace and raps him on the body
good googly turns away from Duminy. This is very impressive from Rashid
sharp turn back into the left-hander
tickled to fine leg
short and wide, Kallis crashes it for four behind square
